column1: in memory ofjulia a. butler 1940 - 2015 | rochester: june 15th 2015. predeceased by her father ernest butler
column2: brother harold. julia is survived by her mother nellie and her children
column12: 3 great grandchildren. her sisters ernestine jones and mildred dean. many nieces and nephews. her memorial service will be held friday june 26th at faith temple at 11am
column13: 1876 elmwood ave. in lieu of flowers contributions may be made to her memorial fund at the following link:
